channel.title: Posts on The Duck Channel´s Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Duck Channel´s Site

item.title: How to Enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux
item.description: Table of Contents Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Install the Keys 2. Update and Upgrade Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux. Chaotic-AUR is a unofficial user reposity for Arch Linux that has prebuilt binaries from the AUR. Several apps and custom kernels are available in this repo, and this includes kernels specially tuned for gamer and desktop use.

item.title: How to Install Linux Mint 20.2 Dual Boot with Windows 10
item.description: Table of Contents Links 1. Bios Considerations 2. Prepare Windows 3. Install Linux Mint 4. Update and Upgrade 5. Finish Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Linux Mint 20.2 Dual Boot with Windows 10. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Linux Mint ISO. I hope you enjoy!

item.title: Install tkg Gamer Kernel to Speed Booster on Arch Linux
item.description: Table of Contents Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Chaotic-AUR 2. Enable Chaotic-AUR 3. Install TKG Kernel 4. Customize Grub Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to install TKG Gamer Kernel on Arch Linux. You only need have one system with Arch Linux fully installed. I hope you enjoy! Links Arch Linux Arch Linux Wiki Arch Linux Wiki - Kernel Chaotic-AUR Steps 1.

item.title: Arch Linux Full Install with bspwm
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Arch Linux with bspwm desktop environment. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Arch Linux ISO. If you use wireless network, please go to the site in the description and see the link to properly configure your network. I hope you enjoy! Links Download the latest Arch Linux ISO Connect to the Internet - Arch Linux Wiki Yay Arch Linux Wiki - Swap File Duck Channel´s bspwm-install 1.

item.title: How to Install LAMP Server on Arch Linux (Apache+PHP+MariaDB) [2021]
item.description: Links Arch Linux Apache MariaDB PHP 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i will show how to install LAMP Server on Arch Linux. I hope you enjoy! 1. Install Apache $ sudo pacman -S apache Save an close the file. $ sudo systemctl enable --now httpd $ sudo systemctl status httpd Edit /srv/http/index.html and put following lines: <html> <title>Welcome</title> <body> <h2>Welcome to Apache test page!

item.title: Install Webmin on Arch Linux
item.description: How to Install Webmin on Arch Linux [2021] Links Webmin Arch Linux Wiki Yay AUR Helper 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Webmin on Arch Linux. Webmin is a web-based interface for system administration for Unix. Using any modern web browser, you can setup user accounts, Apache, DNS, file sharing and much more. I hope you enjoy! 1. Enable AUR If you have AUR enabled in your system, please go to the next section.

item.title: How to Linux Mint 20.2 Mount NTFS Automatically
item.description: Links Linux Mint Download NTFS-3G Arch Linux Wiki 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i will show how to automatically mount NTFS partitions in Linux Mint 20.2 read and write to your regular user. I will mount the partition on /SecondaryDisk directory, so you can change to the directory where you want and any name. I hope you enjoy! 1. Show on Windows Follow the video…

item.title: How to Install Linux Mint 20.2 with Btrfs [2021]
item.description: Links Linux Mint Download Btrfs grub-btrfs Github 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i show how to install Linux Mint 20.2 with btrfs, snapshots and grub-btrfs. The boot mode will be efi; I’m assuming you already have the latest usb stick with the Linux Mint ISO. I hope you enjoy! 1. Bios Considerations Reset BIOS to factory default and reboot. Disable fastboot and secure boot in BIOS settings.

item.title: Archcraft with Btrfs and Dual Boot Windows 10 [2021]
item.description: Links Archcraft Btrfs 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i show how to install Archcraft with btrfs, snapshots, grub-btrfs, dual boot with Windows 10. The boot mode will be efi; I’m assuming you already have the latest usb stick with the Archcraft Linux ISO. You need install Windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! 1. Bios Considerations Reset BIOS to factory default and reboot.

item.title: Arch Linux Btrfs Kde Plasma Full Install [2021]
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Arch Linux with BTRFS filesystem. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Arch Linux ISO. My internet is wired, so if you have wireless network, please go to the website that is in the description of this video and see the link to properly configure your network.
